about.title: what are we doing here?
features: 1️⃣ in the moment you were born the universe configuration was in a specific state that could only be reproduced if the universe has an infinite amount of time
2️⃣ this state is a map for with a very large set of variables that configure all the attributes that shape your existence
3️⃣ we can use this cosmic blueprint to predict the future and understand the past
